title: Vervaeke/JBP Convo and Pageau as Iconoclast of Modernity's Idols. PVK Q/A July 2 2021
description:
Lots of stuff here from toppling the Queen's statue in Canada, the JBP/Vervaeke conversation, and understanding the role Jonathan Pageau is playing at the recession of Modernity. 

@Jonathan Pageau , @Jordan B Peterson , @John Vervaeke 

#jonathanpageau #jordanbpeterson #johnvervaeke

My Substack https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/
